name: Multisim 7 Project File
summary: Learn about .MP7 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MP7 files are used for organizing circuit designs in a project.
NOTE: Multisim version 11 uses .MP11 files for Multisim projects, but it can still open older MP7 files.

description: Circuit design project created by Multisim version 7, a circuit design and analysis application; stores references to one or more PCB circuit designs, which are saved in .MS7 files; can also include simulation data, documents, and reports.
